Amazon's stocking stuffers gift guide includes the best gifts you can buy on Amazon in 2021: Dash mini waffle maker, Carhartt beanie, Bala Bangles, Mario Badescu and more.

— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Shopping for gifts typically includes more than just big-ticket items like Apple AirPods and a brand new Keurig coffee maker—it often involves grabbing a few stocking stuffers, as well. As the name suggests, stocking stuffers are smaller add-ons that you can, well, toss in a stocking.

To help you find the best presents for anyone on your list, Amazon curated a gift guide of its most popular stocking stuffers. Below are 15 of the ones worth buying, from the mini waffle maker everyone loves to the Carhartt beanie that will keep your giftee warm all winter.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

1. Carhartt Beanie

Carhartt is as popular among the outdoors and workwear-loving set as it is among the TikTokers and style mavens. The brand's classic beanie is one of its most popular pieces, with more than 117,000 reviews on Amazon. Made of cozy knit acrylic, it can stretch to fit almost any size head and comes in more than 50 colors, like classic Carhartt brown, snow white and lime green.

Get the Carhartt Acrylic Watch Hat from Amazon for $16.99

2. Pavoi 14K Gold Chunky Hoops

These crazy popular hoops from Amazon cost less than $14 and are made of high quality 14-karat gold. More than 31,000 people have given them a thumbs up, saying the earrings have an on-trend chunky silhouette but are lightweight enough to wear for hours on end. The hoops come in rose, white and yellow gold.

Get the Pavoi 14K Gold Chunky Open Hoops from Amazon for $13.95

3. Dash Mini Waffle Maker

This Dash mini waffle maker may be the trendiest kitchen appliance of 2021, raking in more than 184,000 reviews on Amazon. The pint-sized press yields a 4-inch waffle in minutes with almost zero mess and is as easy to clean as it is to use. Plus, it comes in a variety of pretty colors and patterns.

Get the Dash Mini Waffle Maker from Amazon for $17.99

4. Mario Badescu Facial Spray Collection

Mario Badescu is one of the most famous names in the skincare space—and for good reason. The brand's OG facial spray is loved by more than 48,000 Amazon shoppers, who rave about how refreshing it is, how it soothes and wakes up your skin and how it gives you that perfectly dewy glow. This limited-edition set comes with three aloe-infused sprays: cucumber and green tea, herbs and rosewater and lavender and chamomile.

Get the Mario Badescu Spritz Mist and Glow Facial Spray Collection from Amazon for $21

5. Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Socks

The brand behind the celebrity-favorite CozyChic throw blanket and the cardigan that everyone loves, Barefoot Dreams makes equally luxe socks. Featuring the ultra soft CozyChic material, the socks come in nine muted hues and are one-size-fits-all. People like that they keep your feet nice and toasty and that they're great for lounging around the house on a cold winter day.

Get the Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Socks from Amazon for $17

6. Zulay Handheld Milk Frother

Give them the gift of better coffee with this handheld milk frother, which has racked up more than 51,000 reviews on Amazon. Lightweight and easy to use, it froths up foamy milk in seconds—perfect for cappucinos and lattes alike. Not only that, people say you can use it for much more than just coffee. It's also great for blending matcha tea, protein shakes, soups and more. 

Get the Zulay Handheld Milk Frother from Amazon for $17.99

7. Adidas Originals Relaxed Fit Cap

Whether they're hitting the gym or running errands, this classic Adidas hat will come in handy. Available in 40 colors and prints, from tie-dye to washed denim, the cap is made of breathable, lightweight cotton. It features a relaxed fit that is comfortable to wear all day long and can be adjusted to fit any head. 

Get the Adidas Originals Relaxed Fit Cap from Amazon for $23.40

8. Prextex Plush Dinosaurs

You really can't go wrong with super cool dinosaur toys for kiddos. One such paleontologist-worthy present is this pack of plush dinos, which includes a Tyrannosaurus rex, apatosaurus, triceratops and stegosaurus. The 10-inch stuffed animals are soft and cuddly and can be used for both playtime and bedtime.

Get the Prextex Plush Dinosaurs (4-Pack) from Amazon for $21.24

9. Bala Bangles

For anyone who wants to work on their fitness come the new year, grab them a pair of Bala Bangles. The very trendy wearable weights come in 11 gorgeous colors, from blush pink to sand, and are available in both 1- and 2-pound weight options. Your giftee can wear them on their ankles or their wrists. Our experts who have tested them say the bands are comfortable and chafe-free.

Get Bala Bangles (1-Lb) Wearable Wrist and Ankle Weights from Amazon for $49

10. Silicone Face Mask Brushes

One of the most popular TikTok beauty products of the last year, these silicone brushes are a skincare-lover's dream. More than 67,000 Amazon shoppers are big fans of the brushes, saying they make mixing and applying everything from face masks to serums a lot easier and a lot less messy.

Get the Opiqcey Silicone Face Mask Brush (2-Pack) from Amazon for $4.39

11. Herschel Toiletry Kit

If your giftee has big plans to travel in 2022, help them pack smartly and stylishly with this Herschel toiletry kit. Available in 24 colors and prints, it's made of a durable polyester material and features a mesh pocket inside for extra organization. It comes in a carry-on-approved 3-liter size along with a larger 5-liter version. 

Get the Herschel Chapter Toiletry Kit from Amazon from $23.98

12. Wobble Wag Giggle Ball

Even Fido needs a stocking stuffer or two this holiday. Enter the "As Seen On TV" Wobble Wag Giggle Ball, which has received nearly 50,000 reviews from pet owners on Amazon. The interactive toy makes giggling noises when it's rolled and it will keep your pup entertained for hours. The best part? You don't even need batteries.

Get the Wobble Wag Giggle Ball from Amazon for $7.99

13. Kitsch Spiral Hair Ties

Looking for something small to toss in her stocking? Consider a set of these popular coil hair ties from Kitsch. They come in a variety of colors, from blonde and brunette to clear to "sea vibes" and can work on any hair type. More than 26,000 reviewers have given the spiral hair ties their seal of approval, saying they hold your strands securely in place without any discomfort or kinks. 

Get the Kitsch Spiral Hair Ties from Amazon for $5.39

14. Fonyve Silk Scarf

Silk scarves had a major moment in 2021. Fortunately, you don't have to spend hundreds to give such a stylish gift—in fact, you don't even have to spend $10! This scarf from Amazon has more than 7,100 reviews and is praised for its luxe, silky feel. It comes in 45 pretty prints, from floral to leopard to an on-trend chain design.

Get the Fonyve Silk Head Scarf from Amazon for $9.34

15. Stainless Steel Reusable Straws

Anyone who's eco-conscious will appreciate a pack of reusable straws. Whether they frequent Starbucks every morning or like to sip out of a tumbler all day, they can use these durable stainless steel straws. With more than 31,000 reviews, the pack comes with both bendable and straight straws that can fit up to 30-ounce cups. They're available in silver, black, gold and rose gold. 

Get the Hiware Reusable Stainless Steel Metal Straws (12-Pack) from Amazon for $7.99
